Groups

  • Tango

    Tango is a dance that embodies excitement and passion. This is one of the earliest and hottest dances that can be performed with incredible energy and emotional intensity. Each step in tango is filled with confidence and grace, while the movements of the partners express deep emotional contact.

  • Waltz

    Waltz is a dance that embodies grace and harmony. This is one of the very first and most romantic dances, capable of causing a feeling of bliss and admiration in its observers. Each waltz movement is filled with ease and smoothness, while the partners soar across the dance floor in each other's arms.

  • Hip-hop

    Hip-hop is a dance that represents strength, style and self-expression. This is one of the earliest and hottest dances that can be performed with flair and personality. Every movement in hip-hop is filled with energy and confidence, allowing dancers to express their uniqueness through rhythm and movement.

  • Contemporary

    Contemporary is a dance that embodies expression, deep emotion and artistic expression. This is one of the very first and most emotional dances, which can be performed with ardent passions and intellectual depth. In contemporary dance, every movement is filled with imagery and symbolism, allowing dancers to convey complex emotional states through dance movement.

  • House

    House is a dance that embodies style, energy and inner freedom. This is one of the very first and hottest dances that can be performed with wild fervor and individual style. Each movement of house is filled with energy and a sense of rhythm, allowing the dancers to truly open up and free themselves.
